title: P2P Offers List (request)
description: Returns available offers for use with `p2p_order_create`.

type.description: Which offers to list - buy or sell.

agent_id.description: Which agent to list offers for.

amount.description: How much to buy or sell, used to calculate prices.

country.description: Which country to find offers from.

currency.description: Target currency, defaults to client account currency.

local_currency.description: Currency to conduct payment transaction in, defaults to the main currency for the client's country.

passthrough.description: [Optional] Used to pass data through the websocket, which may be retrieved via the `echo_req` output field.

req_id.description: [Optional] Used to map request to response.
